description: Universal MCP server for test orchestration, execution, and reporting that auto-detects and works with any test framework (pytest, jest, cargo, mocha, vitest)
goal: Build a complete MCP testing infrastructure server that handles framework-agnostic test discovery, execution, result aggregation, analysis, and reporting
requirements: Framework detection for pytest, jest, cargo, mocha, vitest
Test discovery and execution tools (6 tools)
Result aggregation with unified JSON schema
Analysis tools for coverage, flaky tests, performance, health check
constraints: Must work locally without external APIs
Optional integration with other CodeRef servers
